## This is the brief introduction of YUchen Hua
My name is Yuchen Hua, currently a graduate student of Bostatistics in Columbia University Irving Medical Center. I used to be a undergraduate student in Brandeis University, Waltham. During my undergraduate period, I majored in Biochemistry. Some research and internship were done during this period. 
My hobby is [ACG](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ACG_(subculture)) and music.
